name: geoserver-api-reader
description: Build url to query geoserver api services.

scripts.build-package: npm run transpile && npm run generate-types && node tasks/prepare-package.js
scripts.pre-transpile: shx rm -rf build/geoserver-api-reader && shx mkdir -p build/geoserver-api-reader && shx cp -rf src build/geoserver-api-reader/src

author: Andrés Martínez González <andres.geotec@gmail.com> (https://github.com/andres-geotec)
